faq_bot.externals.send_message¶

send message to user

Module Contents¶

faq_bot.externals.send_message.push_message(account_id, content, header=None)¶

Send message to user. the package is the following JSON structure.

reference - Common Message Property

Parameters

  • account_id – user account id

  • content – message content

  • header – http header

faq_bot.externals.send_message.push_messages(account_id, contents)¶

Send multiple messages to users

Parameters

  • account_id – user account id

  • contents – message content list
